model.name: views
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW oneServiceView ( SSN string, FIRSTNAME string, LASTNAME string, ST_ADDRESS string, APT_NUMBER string, CITY string, STATE string, ZIPCODE string, PHONE string, PRIMARY KEY(SSN) ) AS SELECT SSN, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, ST_ADDRESS, APT_NUMBER, CITY, STATE, ZIPCODE, PHONE FROM CUSTOMER;

model.name: H2AccountsSource
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE CUSTOMER ( SSN string(10) NOT NULL OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"SSN"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'CHAR'), FIRSTNAME string(64) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"FIRSTNAME"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR'), LASTNAME string(64) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"LASTNAME"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR'), ST_ADDRESS string(256) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"ST_ADDRESS"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR'), APT_NUMBER string(32) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"APT_NUMBER"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR'), CITY string(64) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"CITY"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR'), STATE string(32) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"STATE"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR'), ZIPCODE string(10) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"ZIPCODE"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR'), PHONE string(15) OPTIONS ("NAMEINSOURCE" '"PHONE"', "NATIVE_TYPE" 'VARCHAR') ) OPTIONS ("UPDATABLE" 'TRUE', "NAMEINSOURCE" '"CUSTOMER"');
